su.label: SU
su.longDescription: Brand new, sealed and unopened in original packaging. The item is unused with undamaged seal and in perfect condition.

no.label: NO
no.longDescription: New and unused in opened original packaging. The item is new and unused, with no signs of use or assembly.

ud.label: UD
ud.longDescription: Used, but in good condition. The item has already been used, but shows no or only minor signs of usage.

rf.label: RF
rf.longDescription: Refurbished and in good condition. The item has been refurbished and is in good condition.
